dirtycontextmanagerps4.c File Reference

dirtycontextManagerPs4 handles thread synchornization for creating and freeing sceHttp, sceSsl and sceNetPool context creation and deletion. This functionality is necessary since the Sony library does not offer a thread safe implementation. More...

Detailed Description

dirtycontextManagerPs4 handles thread synchornization for creating and freeing sceHttp, sceSsl and sceNetPool context creation and deletion. This functionality is necessary since the Sony library does not offer a thread safe implementation.
